alert.note: Alert for Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 8:07PM EDT until August 12 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Fairfield County in southern Connecticut... Putnam County in southeastern New York... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 806 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marlboro, or near Poughkeepsie, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Danbury, Lake Carmel, Sherman, Cold Spring, New Fairfield, Carmel, Fahnestock State Park, Patterson, Putnam Lake, and Brewster Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
